website_summaries.verdict: 10.25-inch cast iron grilling pan with black enamel interior finish, ridged bottom, and colorful exterior enamel finish.
pros: Even heating with enameled cast iron construction
Ridges in bottom allow for lower fat cooking
Durable black enamel cooking surface is non-stick
Solid cast iron handle on one side and helper handle on the other side facilitate moving the pan, with or without oysters
Exterior enamel comes in 5 attractive colors
cons: Manufacturer suggests hand-washing, no dishwasher convenience

customer_reviews.title: Really hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I should have trusted other reviews on this product. It was such a pain to clean I have only ever used it once. Was very disappointed because I have a lot of other Le Creuset cookware and I love all of them(except this one).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive/useless with induction
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed--while it says it works with induction, it does not. Why does OF enamel the bottom of its grill pan? Our other LC pots/pans work, but they don't have enameled bottoms. I paid a lot for this pan, and it is virtually useless.
customer_reviews.author: kristena

customer_reviews.title: It works on an electric stove
customer_reviews.text: Read an article that this wouldn’t work with an electric stove after I bought this. Oops. Guess what? It does work! I created a salmon tail. I brushed it with grape seed oil and cooked it three minutes on each side. Then I put some pesto sauce on it and put in broiler for four minutes. Delicious. Also put some lightly peppered tomato slices with green onions on the grill. Quite good!
customer_reviews.author: Kat Hassard

customer_reviews.title: best ever
customer_reviews.text: hey, it's a Le Creuset ! even with a cheap electric range, this sucker retained heat and seared some pretty wonderful grass fed ribeye steaks ! I am only buying Le Cruset from now on !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sticky
customer_reviews.text: Tried every temp, still sticky! hate this feature, wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: African Princess

customer_reviews.title: Not non stick
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that does not cook like other enameled le creuset pots. Very hard to clean and definitely not nonstick
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Steaks came through great, not for much other use, not easy to clean, but tough.
customer_reviews.text: Rub steak fat, cook, four minutes each side, steaks came out great, primary cooking, it's hefty, not your flipping kind, very tough, the slots are not easy to clean, I only cook one NY cut steaks, over 3/4 lbs, after flip, some cut mushrooms on the sides, soy or sauce, stirs the mushrooms near the end, done. You can do two NY steaks, one good size porterhouse, not cheap, but bought it on sale, I think. I use cheap take out chopsticks to clear the slots, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Kincheda

customer_reviews.title: Great grill pan
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Grills nice and hot.It is a very heavy pan.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi h

customer_reviews.title: Grill Pan For Life
customer_reviews.text: I love love LOVE this pan!!!! This one was purchased as a gift. I have a well seasoned one of my own. The trick is keep it well oiled (Canola) and get it smoking hot for cooking.... it’s magic!!!
customer_reviews.author: ScorpioDF53

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: After I tried it I don’t think I can live without it anymore. It really cooks good meat, chicken, and fish. I use it to fry And to grill things. Food doesn’t stich and it’s easy to clean. But it’s a little bit heavy and the edges get very hot. You always need a glove to touch it when it’s on the stove.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money! Perfect when it’s too hot to grill outdoors. Gives perfect grill marks & cooks amazing❣️❣️❣️
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTI

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but excellent
customer_reviews.text: We've owned a few Le Creuset products over the years and they never disappoint. You get what you pay for it. It is pricey, no doubt, but I feel that the quality of the product justifies the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Alex B.

customer_reviews.title: Best skillet ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy skillet. The coatings seem to be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: adam wiljer

customer_reviews.title: No Grill? No Problem!
customer_reviews.text: This skillet has yet to disappoint. We don't have easy access to our grill right now (to the complete dismay of my husband) so needed another solution. I already have a tried and true set of flame Le Creuset, so decided to jump in and buy the skillet. It works amazing on smaller European flame stoves, and has freed us from greasy, pan fried steaks. Everything from chicken, pork, red meats, etc. cuts like butter. We're avid campers, and fully intend to pack this as our primary cooking item for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Best Skillet Ever for Grilling
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a skillet that I could cook on the electric stove with to grill meat. This is the best skillet I have ever had and was well worth the price. Grilled chicken breasts had grill marks and were juicy and full of that char grilled flavor. Hamburgers turned out great on it too. I like that it has the deep grill marks and a moat around the edge of the pan to catch drippings. With the spout on the spade, the long handle on one side and the loop handle on the other, it's easy to pour off the grease and to clean. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: We love the cook on it-there is no match! It cooks evenly and fast. I love cast iron cookware and this brand is among the best I’ve used. Only con is cleaning can be difficult due to the grill design. I’m looking for cleaning tips for grill pans online to make cleaning easier.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made pan that should last generations. The porcelain coating makes for easy cleanup too. I use it on my induction plate as well as my gas stove.
customer_reviews.author: KRT

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product and brand
customer_reviews.text: Love the brand and love how it cooks meats, especially steaks.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: This will make you miss your grill
customer_reviews.text: The only thing wrong with this pan is that now my husband refuses to use the grill. Sometimes a gal wants that charcoal flavoring. He remains tied to this pan as it's easy to clean up and he feels like he's got the temp down just right for "grill" like results.
customer_reviews.author: CSquared L

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The pan arrived broken. The pan handle was broken completely off and enamel is damaged to the point you can see the cast iron. Not useable. Hope this is not common have heard so many good things about this company.
customer_reviews.author: Dean bailey

customer_reviews.title: Good cooking but very hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: It's true with all ridged cast iron pans that they cook meat fabulously; however, for the price of this enamel coated pan, you'd expect it to be easier to clean. That is certainly true for my other Le Creuset pots and pans. This grill pan is very hard to get clean. The meat fuses to the pan between the ridges. It is no easier to clean than uncoated cast iron. I love Le Creuset, but for this pan only, save your money and buy uncoated cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Would give this a zero if I could. Very hard to lift and clean Never use it. Easy to cook outside instead
customer_reviews.author: pjs

product_meta.title: Le Creuset Cast Iron Signature Square Skillet Grill, 10 1/4", Oyster
product_meta.description: Size:10.25"| Color:BlackWith Le creuset grills you can cut the fat but retain the flavor. The deep ribs separate the fat from the food allowing for healthier cooking. The grills can go on the stove or under the broiler - a rainy day will never prevent you from enjoying your favorite barbeque foods. The ribbed base sears food evenly and gives the characteristic char lines. With Le creuset grills you can serve it with a sizzle. Whether frying, grilling, or sauteing, the satin black enamel interior on our grills can withstand the rigors of everyday use and offer great flexibility. Best of all, they require no seasoning and will not absorb odors or flavors. .
feature_bullets: Square grill pan made of even-heating enameled cast iron
Ridges impart tasty grill marks on food and allow for lower-fat cooking
Cast-iron handle and opposite helper handle facilitate convenient transport
Hand washing recommended; oven- and broiler-safe
Measures approximately 12 by 13-1/2 by 2 inches; Limited Lifetime warranty
